website_summaries.verdict: Cozy and soft, this playard sheet will keep your little one warm and comfortable all winter.
pros: Thicker and warmer than other playard sheets
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: The sheet can bunch up due to a smaller amount of elastic trim, but some love the softness so much they add it themselves

customer_reviews.title: Also works on dog beds!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see we purchased this sheet for our dog bed to give him a clean option. I am posting just to let others know that this sheet fits the FurHaven Pet Orthopedic Luxe Lounger Pet Bed for Dogs and Cats in size Large. The sheet feels amazing, I can see why it would work great in the winter or colder weather for a baby's pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: lilli

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is very soft and comfortable. My baby gets hot when he sleeps and the material doesn’t seem to make him too hot. Great quality. Fits my 3” foam pack and play mini mattress with the pad cover on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Wycuff

customer_reviews.title: Sides keep bunching up
customer_reviews.text: This is very soft and plush feeling, my baby just loved snuggling and sleeping on it. Only con, is the sides do not have elastic and kept bunching up on the sides. Of my baby even gently pulls on the sheet, the sides come up. I will looking into sewing in some elastic my self to fix in the problem. Sheet was a little pricey for not having elastic on all 4 sides. $19
customer_reviews.author: SwissymissTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Your baby will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's more expensive than normal cotton sheets, but it sure is worth it. Soft like velvet, doesn't absorb moisture like cotton does. Keeps your baby from laying in a super wet bed if they drool or spit up a little, and lessens the likelihood of them getting a rash from it. My baby seems to really like sleeping on this, too. I had this material for my cosleeper and loved it, so I was thrilled to find this for my pack and play, which my baby is sleeping in now (with an upgraded mattress).
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these sheets. Bought the crib size 2 years aho Ann's still soft and in great condition bought these for the pack n play thatI just purchased a 3 inch mattress for and they for great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Super soft PLAYYARD SHEET!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super super soft PLAYYARD SHEET. Some reviews said it was a crib sheet but it is absolutely not. This doesn’t have pockets like a mattress sheet would. It’s strictly for a pack and play. There’s no way this even comes close to fitting length wise on a normal standard crib mattress. Aside from that it’s about the softest sheet that I’ve felt! Quality seems on point and I feel safe using it because it fits nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiFL14

customer_reviews.title: Infant luxury!!
customer_reviews.text: This material is so plush and stretchy it's perfect for my pack and play mattress. It even fit over a pack and play memory foam mat I purchased to lay on top of the hard cardboard box type material that comes standard with the pack and play. Easy to wash and keeps its plush feel. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: EVERY BABY SHOULD SLEEP ON THESE SHEETS!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets! Very soft and warm. Baby loves them. If she falls asleep during feeding/rocking, we can put her in her crib and the sheets are so snuggly and warm. No cold sheets for this baby!!! They wash up great and are of excellent quality. Color is true. Loved these crib sheets so much we bought the same thing for her pack n play. Same excellent quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeAussies21

customer_reviews.title: Soft, and washes nicely
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, the medium gray color matched my older Graco portable crib. Elastic all around made for a nice fit on the 2" thick foam mattress I purchased to upgrade the old crib. Washed the sheet and machine dried it, it came out just as soft with no noticeable shrinkage. It would have fit more snug on a 3" mattress or one that was fabric covered. I will add one of those clips with the elastic straps to hold the middle tight because my grand-daughter likes to tug on things and I can see her being able to pull the sheet off if she wanted to. The added center strap will prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, fit could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Used for my baby boy in his pack'n'play for a bit of extra warmth. He loves it and I have purchased two now. The only issue is fit. I happen to have sheet clips I use to hold it tight. I would not let him sleep on this without them. It bunches on the thin mattress. I imagine it would be fine on a normal mattress. Overall I would recommend as long as you have the sheet stays to use in a pack'n'play.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They fit our pack n play perfectly, giving our little one a nice super soft bed and safer than a blanket. I was afraid that they might be too lose in the thin padded board, but I haven’t had any issues. I even ordered another one and they have washed up great. My daughter loves the feel of the soft fabric and these do not disappoint. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaAnn

customer_reviews.title: A great find! I do recommend
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases ever on Amazon. Its a beautiful soft pink and it is so very soft. It fit my daughter's mini crib perfect. I have trouble find sheets that don't make her mattress bow this is does not have that problem. Perfect for winter / spring.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Too big for pack n play mattress
customer_reviews.text: It's super soft and made well but is too big for my full size Graco pack n play mattress. The pockets on it are too deep and would fit a mattress that is an inch or so thicker than a regular play pen mattress. I pulled the bottom of it as tight as I could and it's still too loose for me to be comfortable with my little one sleeping on it overnight. It held up well after washing though.
customer_reviews.author: Icicle

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy for baby
customer_reviews.text: This playyard sheet is so soft and cozy. It is sturdily constructed and is easy to put on the playyard mat. I love knowing my baby is surrounded by something soft and cozy while also adhering to all safe sleep guidelines to ensure her safety!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, babe loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping my 3 month old will sleep longer in his PNP bed and so far it’s worked! He likes sleeping on soft things but I want him to at least sleep on something flat, so I tried this because of it’s softness and he loves it! I wish they made one in king size for me!
customer_reviews.author: Akass04

customer_reviews.title: Great sheet !
customer_reviews.text: Lovely soft sheet for my granddaughter’s pack n play. I ordered her a mattress topper and the sheet fits over the two inch foam nicely. She doesn’t get too hot with it and she loves to rub her face on it. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria K Richard

customer_reviews.title: Plush fabric
customer_reviews.text: We just transferred our baby from a small included sleeper to a pack n play style crib. Her sleeper was lined with microfleece and she was used to rubbing her face on the soft material to self soothe. This lovely cuddly fabric is just the thing to make baby comfy in her new bed. It is so plush! It fits the 3 inch mattress I bought perfectly and still stretched to fit rolled towels and a small wedge underneath as we slowly ween baby from an enclosed inclined sleeping place to a flat bed. She loves it, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just loves soft things on her cheek. It puts her right to sleep, so I looked for a plush bed cover. It's very soft and nice. A little bit thin, but it fits the pack n' play very well.
customer_reviews.author: K_Stegosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Cozy Little Sheet
customer_reviews.text: Nice cozy sheet. Fits our pack and play mattress well, although it could be a touch more snug. It had a few loose threads when I opened the package, but I simply clipped them and have not experienced any further issues. The material resists stains and moisture and provides a nice soft, cozy place for baby to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: allthatglittersisgold

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love this sheet for babys pack n play. Its so soft and cozy. I have a 2 inch foam topper on top of the pack n play mattress and this fits it perfectly. If i didn't have the topper then it would probably be loose.
customer_reviews.author: RDavis

customer_reviews.title: So soft and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those cold winter nights! It fits onto the crib mattress perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and washed it before use. It came out beautifully from the wash/dry without losing lots of fuzz or softness. Fits well on my slightly older pack and play with elastic. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mom & More

customer_reviews.title: Couch Cushion Covers for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: We have pearl-colored couches. These are perfect for covering the cushions on the couch and on the overstuffed chairs. They wash up beautifully and stay on! Highly recommend for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Woogie

customer_reviews.title: Comforting for babies not old enough to sleep with blankets!
customer_reviews.text: Helps comfort baby at night since he is too young to sleep with blankets. Only problem is he loves snuggling his face in it so may not be great for under 6 or 7 months. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kerriann Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Softest sheets! Babies love!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are amazing! Bought for daycare crib and all the teachers even rave about them! They are super soft and comfy! They wash well and come in pretty colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, warps pack n play “mattress”
customer_reviews.text: It pulls up on my pack n play mattress and doesn’t lay flat. It isn’t TERRIBLE, but kind of disappointing. The material is extremely soft, my son doesn’t seem to mind it pushing up in some spots. Overall for safety and comfort, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ali McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves these! MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: 3 month old LOVES these sheets!! Got them when he was 1 month old bc he loves the snugglie feeling. Super soft a nice grey color! I didn’t realize how stiff some sheets were until it came time to put them on the crib and pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: So Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good purchase! It hugs the mattress for our Ingenuity "pack n play" item. So soft and beautiful! I am debating on getting more in other colors and for the crib mattress as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Ali

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm.
customer_reviews.text: So much softer than a regular sheet. It also doesn’t seem to get as cool as a regular sheet does, which is helpful when laying down a sleeping baby. The color was as described. I used one of those elastic sheet clip things in the middle of this on the underside to make sure it stays snug.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our pack n play for our son and he seems to love it. We didn’t want to put him on that hard cardboard so we decided to purchase a mattress and we wanted a soft cover. This does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Simpse01

customer_reviews.title: Saves the night!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft! Made the pack and play a place my grandson would sleep! Has saved many family vacations! The first time without the comfy cozy sheet was a disaster! Never again without it!
customer_reviews.author: SDLloyd

customer_reviews.title: Pack n Play mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover/ sheet for my Graco pack n play is so very soft and cuddly. It fits the mattress perfect. I would definitely purchase this again and recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan City, IN

customer_reviews.title: So very soft
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves his "so soft" sheet in his Pack & Play, with a 2" "mattress" on top. Fits perfectly!Feels great! Fits great! Haven't laundered it yet, so I can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Rebello

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I live this sheet is super soft easy to clean stretchy enough to fit the mattress but not be loose is been in the washer a couple of times already and still looks like new
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is so soft. It is a little big for the out pack n play but we will definitely keep it. The sheet has elastic on all four sides so it has no problem staying on. It’s a great deal for the money!
customer_reviews.author: T Riley

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: Washed in cold water with baby clothes and dried it on medium heat. Did shrink maybe by a quarter of an inch. Was not a problem and still fit snug on play pen mattress on 2”.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi from Tx

customer_reviews.title: Not for pack and play standard insert.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I read said this would work for a pack and play insert. There was so much extra fabric there. There is no way that would be safe for a small baby. It was soft, and washed well, but not the right size I need.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Richter

customer_reviews.title: Soft and thick!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fitted crib sheet! It is SO soft and adds warmth to the crib for the winter months. I don't expect to use it in the summer, but I have thinner muslin sheets for that time of year. This is very cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft like the other big name chamois sheets
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of the chamois crib sheets from Pottery Barn Kids. These American Baby Play yard sheets are nearly just as soft. I bought this for the pack and play at grandma's house. Nice material and washes up great. Makes the pack and play a little more cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: So Soft
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! It is such a pleasant surface for baby because it is soft but also doesn't feel cold at first touch making it less likely she wakes up as I lay her down. Good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and fits pack n play perfectly. My newborn didn't have any complaints so far lol
customer_reviews.author: B. Tompa

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is very soft and good quality material. I bought it so my newborns crib would be warmer than with the normal mattress sheets. It fits well on the mattress
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy's Family

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: It's a little big on my graco pack and play, but i just tucked the extra under and it seems fine! Baby girl loves the soft material vs a regular sheet #spoiled lol
customer_reviews.author: Peinado Cross Family

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, my baby sleeps better in her pack n play than any of my other 4 kids have. Has stood up to washing.
customer_reviews.author: TS Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Doesn't fit my playyard mattress even though It says it does, and tore easily. You can't practice safe sleep with this. The only thing that is good about it is it's soft.
customer_reviews.author: MommaG

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfy. The shade of navy blue is also really pretty. I am especially pleased with this purchase. On a side note, we are using sheet suspenders to keep them taunt. Overall, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! So soft and fits perfectly. I wish I had one for my own bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkandy

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!🤩
customer_reviews.text: You need this is you are worried about keeping your baby warm! My baby loooves the feel of it too and will go down to nap or sleep instantly on it. Before he would fuss and look around to find me to get him out of the crib. Get this sheet!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lmott

customer_reviews.title: Soft cozy sheet my son loves
customer_reviews.text: I did not know that they made these fitted sheets for pack n plays!! I was thrilled when I learned this! My son loves his fleece crib blankets so this was a easy purchase! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Genna J

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Fits pack n play mattress
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a mattress to fit my Babys pack n play and so I needed a fitted sheet. This fit perfectly!! The material is super soft and fuzzy. My baby loves to sleep with a soft fuzzy blanket so this sheet is wonderful! I’ll be buying more since baby and I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how soft this sheet is! My baby loves it! Fits well on a 3inch mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Shivonne D.

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: This fits a Pak 'n Play perfectly. It is so soft I love using it for my grandbabies.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Soft minky like pack and play sheet. Perfect for those early months beside mom and dads bed or for traveling use later on.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase for my youngest that sleeps in pack n play on the regular!
customer_reviews.author: Michele P

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Crib
customer_reviews.text: Fit, quality, and comfort. Highly recommend for a pack and play!
customer_reviews.author: judy saylor

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves the soft sheets in his crib so I got these to fit in his pack n' play for when we travel. He seems to love them. I will be buying this same brand for the crib when it's time to buy sheets for baby #2!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo soft
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is warm and soft against baby’s skin This was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: S. Verdon

customer_reviews.title: So soft, adds comfort without risking safety!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t washed it yet but I love it so far! Makes my sons crib so much cozier without risking his safety!
customer_reviews.author: Vik walkowiak

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect fit and softness we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R. Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and not thin!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft silky and a nice thickness. My kids napped instantly on the first try. Amazing buy! I used for our baby bjorn travel cribs. Fits great not perfect because it’s for a pack and play but good enough!
customer_reviews.author: TruthSpeaker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sleeps better because of these. The wash up great!
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: it’s good.
customer_reviews.text: soft , inexpensive , easy to clean. it’s great, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Elola

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Used this same sheet in blue 4 years ago for my baby boy and just bought one for my baby girl. So soft and warm so baby doesn't wake up when they are laid down. Also washes very well, doesnt stain easily. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit snugly on our Pack 'n Play mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit snugly and I was worried it would slip off, which wouldn't have been super safe.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a standard size crib mattress
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT FIT A STANDARD SIZE CRIB MATTRESS!!! Super disappointed, we’ve waited on this crib sheet for over a month, got here and does not fit a standard crib mattress, doesn’t even cover half! See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Snuggly
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I purchased. My kids love the softness of the sheet and snuggle right in.
customer_reviews.author: Jirishred

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Wish they made them in crib size
customer_reviews.author: E. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Lasts fine through being washed and dried normally
customer_reviews.text: Fits a pack n play matress perfectly. Made of a soft, velvety material. Lasts fine through being washed and dried normally; no color fading, pilling, wearing, stretching/shrinking, etc.
customer_reviews.author: LexCo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and fits the playard mattress well. My daughter loves sleeping on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, great color sheet
customer_reviews.text: So soft, helped me realize my baby is so high maintenance he will only sleep on something this soft lol! But main thing is, this sheet really did help my baby sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our pack n play. Adds extra comfort for the babies.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleO

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sheets. We live in a cold environment and these are perfect for our pack and play. They are not overly hot. Baby loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Safe
customer_reviews.text: I need to order a second one because I feel bad for my baby when I have to wash this one. I feel like any other sheet is not as soft or comfortable. This is very soft and fits her mattress perfectly. I've never had it pop off the edges of the mattress so I feel safe knowing leaving her to sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this sheet! It's so very soft and has deep pockets to stay on the mattress. Washed up perfectly when dried on a low setting. Will only be using these from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Carey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it. Clean, soft and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Mslacy

customer_reviews.title: Cloud soft but not hot like others.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson will be staying with me while both of his parents are deployed. He hates sleeping in a pack and play but I have found that he sleeps better with this sheet, it's super soft but does not cause him to sweat like others. A great bargain for restless babies.
customer_reviews.author: Dulcieb101

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: I love this sheet. Very soft, much better than putting baby on cold cotton sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, breathable, & warm.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cozy, keeps the baby warmer and comfier in the winter time. Doesn’t feel cold like your typical sheet! Soft & breathable. We have 4!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Cozy sheets!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love them! They are so soft and cozy I have actually bought 2 and may buy another! They fit the 3 inch mattress you can put in the pack n play for extra comfort. She’s sleeps on it every night!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsae Carper

customer_reviews.title: Soft soft soft! Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and already bought another one for my crib. Buy this!!! I placed my baby on it and he instantly smiled and started rubbing his face all over it. Super cute, super soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and soft. Fits pack n play matress perfect. I am very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Mama

customer_reviews.title: cozy and soft
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my baby's mini crib and it fits pretty well. It is cozy and warm for winter, and I'm hoping it will make the pack in play feel familiar if we go on a vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, super soft
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, super soft, love these sheets! I feel like we spoiled our boy with them, but you can't spoil a baby, right?!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie K

customer_reviews.title: Soft pack n play sheets
customer_reviews.text: Soft and warm pack n play sheets. Washed well and are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very soft good price. I fit it over mattress insert in pack n play. Fits perfectly with no buckling or looseness.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, warm, comfortable. Fits the play pen mattress perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jessie joye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the cold weather
customer_reviews.text: This sheet fits perfectly, easy to clean, and keeps my baby warm. I washed it about 20x and it is still in tact. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: This sheet does not fit a standard baby crib mattress. It is much too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, soft, and warm
customer_reviews.text: Love this sheet. It’s so pretty and looks so rich. It’s also very warm. I wish I had them in multiple colors.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky K.

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little funny but they're so soft without being thick and still fits snugly. Great color.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pack and play sheet. Its fits snug, not too tight or anything. It is extremely soft, I'm jealous and want sheets like it for myself. My lo passes out so quick at bed time, and sleeps all night long now!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and super soft
customer_reviews.text: So very soft and fits the playpen/bed for our granddaughter. No complaints from her and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET A. BYRNE

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby, Happy mom
customer_reviews.text: This sheet fits the Graco Pack & Play. So soft and comfy. Daughter loves this above any sheet previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: K H Black

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very soft at first use but shrunk horribly and wasn’t nearly as soft afterwards and began shredding
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Helms

customer_reviews.title: My son slept great on it
customer_reviews.text: So velvity soft. Seems very cozy to lay on. I got this for the winter as it’s a little warmer and cozy then a cold cotton sheet. My son slept great on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my sons pack n’ play mattress. The fitted sheet is super soft and it fit perfectly! The material feels almost like a soft baby blanket. Itd been washed a few times now and so far it seems to be holding up well while still remaining soft.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly soft and great quality. Didn’t have a sheet this nice with ...
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly soft and great quality. Didn’t have a sheet this nice with my First and really glad to have something so soft for my second
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby girl :)
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for our highly tactile little baby girl. We were transitioning her to sleep in a pack n play and this made all the difference for her. I wish we had gotten two!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Great for pack and play
customer_reviews.text: This is super soft and works great for pack and play
customer_reviews.author: A hebert

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! My two week old naps on it. The sheet has a soft and warm feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Sorrell

product_meta.title: American Baby Company Heavenly Soft Chenille Fitted Pack N Play Playard Sheet, Gray, 27 x 39, for Boys and Girls
product_meta.description: Color:GrayOur heavenly soft chenille fitted playard sheet fits standard size 27" x 39" mattress pad. 4" deep pocket with elastic all around for a snug and secure fit for baby's comfort. The ultra soft elegant material is perfect for baby's comfort. A must have for today's nursery and is available in a variety of colors to match your favorite bedding in the nursery. Machine washable cold with gentle cycle , tumble dry low for best results.
feature_bullets: 100% Velvety Polyester. Measures 27 inches x 39 inches x 3 inches.
SOFT. Perhaps the softest most velvety sheet your baby will ever snuggle on.
QUALITY. Snug fit with deep pockets and elastic trim to hug a Playard (pack n play) mattress. Machine washable.
SELECTION. Available in a variety of colors to match any style.
